description:
Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keep Shirahoshi Safe! Decken Close Behind!
Protéger la princesse à tout prix ! Decken le coriace !
Shirahoshi o Mamore: Decken no Tsuigeki
しらほしを守れ デッケンの追撃
